mainText:
You don't know me, but I can truly say that you have inspired me to "live my
life" and not what others want me to live.

You have touched millions and inspired us all.

I am in awe of what you were able to do in 56 short years.

You will be truly missed.

Thanks for leaving the world a better place.
header: You were a visionary and an inspiration
author: Kent
